[03-Jun-2025 10:35:18 UTC] WordPress database error
 

MySQL query:

CREATE TABLE wp_issgmbm_errors ( id bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, post_id bigint(20) NOT NULL, location_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, gmb_local_post_name varchar(255) NOT NULL, scheduled varchar(14) NOT NULL, recurring varchar(1) NOT NULL, repost varchar(1) NOT NULL, repost_every varchar(3) NOT NULL, times_reposted bigint(10) NOT NULL, last_posted varchar(14) NOT NULL, error varchar(255) NOT NULL, added varchar(20) NOT NULL, UNIQUE KEY id (id), PRIMARY KEY (post_id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
